description: full length image of a man dressed in black standing in the center of the image bent forward; his arms at his side are lifted to waist level and his large hands are splayed out to the sides; his head is tilted down and thrust forward
inscription: LL in pencil, two inches below image: iv/v Japan. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar | LRC of sheet, written in pencil inside brown stamp with black border: 35 | LR margin of sheet in red crayon: 25
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: Das Müde-sein. I
title: Being Tired
